IndexPage.Title: Welcome to the Task Management System of Ben and Asaf!
IndexPage.TextLine: Existing user? click the 'Login' button on the navigation bar.
New user? click the 'Register' button on the navigation bar.

LoginPage.Title: Login
LoginPage.TextLine: Please insert your user email and password.

RegisterPage.Title: Registration
RegisterPage.TextLine: Please fill all the fields and press "Submit".
